query:
WITH target AS (
                SELECT user_id, username, bio, image
                FROM users
                WHERE username = $1
            ),
            deleted AS (
                DELETE FROM follows WHERE following_user_id = $2 AND followed_user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM target)
            )
            SELECT
                target.username,
                target.bio,
                target.image,
                target.user_id,
                FALSE AS "user_following!"
            FROM target
